items.description: A little tea on 'Sinners' *and* 'Blade,' plus Thunderbolts, a zombie-rrific trilogy, and more.

items.title: New YA Book Releases for July 30, 2025

items.title: A Haunting Yet Beautiful Portrait of a Climate Devastated World
items.description: The atmospheric and affecting writing paints a tragic and memorable portrait of a dying world.

items.title: Read This, Then That: Historical Romance Edition
items.description: Dabble in some historical romance, then get into the nonfiction behind it. There are "female husbands," Black cowboys, and more.
